list_definition.definition: (a piece of) long narrow cord made of threads twisted together, or tape, for tying, fastening etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: a piece of string to tie a parcel

list_definition.definition: a fibre/fiber etc, eg on a vegetable.
a piece of wire, gut etc on a musical instrument, eg a violin

list_definition.definition: a series or group of things threaded on a cord etc

list_definition.mean_english: buộc bằng dây, treo bằng dây
list_definition.definition: to put (beads etc) on a string etc

list_definition.definition: to put a string or strings on (eg a bow or stringed instrument)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The archer strung his bow and aimed an arrow at the target.

list_definition.definition: to tie and hang with string etc
